Name: M ___ - Mr. George Goodmon, a Commissioner of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR GEORGE GOODMON AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY LOCAL CONDITIONAL RELEASE COMMISSION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 9-207 of the New York City Administrative Code and Section 271 of the New York State Correction Law, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of George Goodmon as a member of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission to serve a four-year term.
